archimate:Requirement.name: IA-4(4): Identifier Management | Identify User Status
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Manage individual identifiers by uniquely identifying each individual as [Assignment: organization-defined characteristic identifying individual status].

properties.value: Characteristics that identify the status of individuals include contractors, foreign nationals, and non-organizational users. Identifying the status of individuals by these characteristics provides additional information about the people with whom organizational personnel are communicating. For example, it might be useful for a government employee to know that one of the individuals on an email message is a contractor.
